meta.article_title: March 21, 2016 - Visualize Your Serves and Make Them Do Tricks

debutant.step: Visualize the contact, direction, speed, spin, height, depth, bounces, and curve of the ball before serving
debutant.technique: Practice serves with backspin where you graze the ball so finely that all your energy goes into backspin

exercices_complementaires.description: Serve with backspin where the ball bounces backward into the net, visualizing its actual path in advance.
Serve with sidespin, curving the ball into a target, visualizing its entire path in advance.

metriques_progression: Number of serves with controlled spin
erreurs_a_eviter: Serving too low on the net
